data.name: 0001 (354.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey

data.name: 0003 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What greeted me after I opened the door, was that meaninglessly refreshing smile.

data.name: 0002 (354.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Hey, how's it going?

data.name: 0004 (354.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oh, it's just you?

data.name: 0005 (354.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. No one was here when I arrived.

data.name: 0000 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That was, after school one day.

data.name: 0006 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can't just turn my heel back. I sat down in a convenient position.

data.name: 0010 (354.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh? Chess

data.name: 0011 (354.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: You know the rules?

data.name: 0013 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And by the way, I'll say this. I'm not afraid of any plans or appointments.

data.name: 0015 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I said that and moved to the seat in front of Koizumi.

data.name: 0016 (354.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Are you sure? Let's take the first move

data.name: 0017 (354.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is it okay? Koizumi Give me that.

data.name: 0020 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I moved the first pawn.

data.name: 0022 (354.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...... Ohh, sure

data.name: 0009 (354.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: By the way, if you like chess, would you like to have a partner?

data.name: 0012 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How do other members still appear? I don't know at all.

data.name: 0014 (354.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...... Oh, okay. I'll join you, then.

data.name: 0018 (354.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Don't worry about it. I've also improved my skills since then.

data.name: 0019 (354.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...... then don't hesitate

data.name: 0021 (354.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: This reminds me of the training camp.

data.name: 0023 (354.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I put it on something and played an important role. Because it's a substitute

data.name: 0025 (354.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It was a pretty thrilling night.

data.name: 0026 (354.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Thrilling. I'm more of a doom and gloom kind of person. I think I'd be more comfortable with that.

data.name: 0028 (354.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If you're thinking about the past, I think a little beautification is necessary.

data.name: 0027 (354.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: However, we're spending our days safely this way.

data.name: 0008 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If you look at Koizumi, you'll see he is starting to line up chess pieces.

data.name: 0030 (354.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: All right, thank you.

data.name: 0032 (354.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, you did it

data.name: 0034 (354.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm going to get serious from here.

data.name: 0036 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No one has come to the club room yet.

data.name: 0037 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Before I knew it, I was passionate about playing chess with Koizumi.

data.name: 0039 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, I might have improved my skills a little bit. Maybe.

data.name: 0041 (354.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What did you say?

data.name: 0043 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This is how casual after school goes by.

data.name: 0029 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How much to beautify that training camp I wonder if it will be a pleasant memory

data.name: 0031 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: My knight knocks out one of Koizumi's pawns from the top of the board.

data.name: 0033 (354.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Where did you raise your arm, where?

data.name: 0035 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You say things that have no reliability. Koizumi also proceeded with Knight.

data.name: 0038 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After all, Koizumi is weak and has some tension, but...…

data.name: 0040 (354.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...... Sometimes this kind of thing isn't so bad.

data.name: 0042 (354.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's nothing. See, check it out!

data.name: 0024 (354.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: However, the memories are fun. It’s just a memory that I’m just tired of.
